author: Andrey Feldman
title: 'Impossible' black hole collision pushed relativity to its breaking point — and scientists finally understand how - Yahoo
description: In 2023, scientists detected the gravitational waves from a black hole collision that seemed impossible. New research finally explains how this "forbidden" black hole came to be, and what it can teach us about these extreme objects.
content:
Scientists have traced the origins of the most massive black hole
 merger ever observed, revealing how two "impossible" giants may have formed despite long-standing assumptions that such objects sho… [+6410 chars]
